category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_DisableTypeAheadFacetSearch
preference.preference_description: Turns off the type-ahead facet search in the filter panel in the Active Workspace. When this value is true, the facet search box is rendered with a search icon which requires a click or ENTER key to perform the facet search. When this value is false, the facet search box does not have a search icon, and each key-pressing will perform a facet search. The default value is false (type-ahead is on).
